title: Stanley Bagshaw And the Short-sighted Football Trainer
description: Young Stanley Bagshaw is distraught when he is unable to find tickets to a match featuring his local soccer team, Huddersgate Albion. Upset but still wanting to partake in the game activities, Stanley heads to the stadium looking for player autographs and gets a bit of luck kicked his wayâ€”instead of autographs, he gets to see the match and save the day. Colorful pictures and amusing rhyming couplets make this charming tale an enchanting and useful tool for early readers.
author: Bob  Wilson
